projects.name: Shuffle Your Worries
projects.description: Built using Three.js for dynamic user interaction with 3D models created in Blender, this web app offers a creative way to help you visualize and untangle an overloaded mind.

projects.name: Shopping Cart
projects.description: A kitchen shopping website developed with React, TypeScript. Styled with SASS and implemented 3D product models with Three.js to increase the user experience.

projects.name: eGo
projects.description: eGo, developed with React, MongoDB, and styled-components, this web application tracks carbon footprint reduction and helps users set sustainability goals.

projects.name: Game UnderTech
projects.description: The Undertech Game is an interactive text-based adventure game built using React and Zustand for handeling the global variables.

projects.name: To-do List
projects.description: A simple To-Do List App allows users to manage their tasks efficiently. Users can add tasks with descriptions, mark tasks as complete, remove tasks, and toggle between light and dark themes.

projects.name: Movie App
projects.description: The movie app lets user search and browse through movies according to different sorting. If the user have a favorite movie and want to find similar ones, the app has a feature to show similar options.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts App
projects.description: The happy thought posting app allows users to share positive thoughts and messages with others. Users can view, like, and post their own happy thoughts.

projects.name: Dream Home Survey
projects.description: This survey app is designed to gather preferences from users regarding their ideal living space. Users engage with a dynamic questionnaire with various input types, such as drop-down questions, color picker, text field and so on.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: TThe Music Releases app presents newly released music with organized components for albums and playlists. It offers interactive features like hovering over album covers for play and like options, and clicking on covers links to Spotify

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A vanilla JS App where weather data is fetched from OpenWeather. It displays the weather information along with visual styles like different weather icons and color themes to represent the current conditions.
